Reviews.Title: Satisfecho con el producto!!!!
Reviews.Author: Vicente Mota
Reviews.Content: Entrega a tiempoEs el mismo productoEs la Misma EspecificaciónTal y como se ve en la fotografíatodo perfecto!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very bad camera
Reviews.Author: John Chatham
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to my home indoor security. I wasn't expecting much from this camera as its cheap price, but the picture goes blank after setting up no more than 30 seconds.Don't let the cheap price fool you. You get what you pay for.Don't buy this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Super low lux 0 Lux minimum illumination
Wide angle lens
420 TV Lines
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Indoor White Dome Surveillance Video Security Camera with 1/4-Inch Sharp CCD, 420TVL. 3.6mm Wide Angle View Lens
